text: Ezɨ Korinɨn gumaziba, maghɨra Sostenesɨn suira, a Judabar dɨpenir God ko mɨgeimɨn garir gumazir dapanim, egha kotɨn danganim boroghɨra a mɨsosi. Ezɨ Galio bizir me amizir kam gunuira.(18:17) Grighɨn akam deragha bizir kam gɨfozir puvatɨ. Fofozir gumazir maba ghaze, Judaba uari uan gumazir dapanir ekiamɨn atarav egha me a mɨsosi.
